context.task:
PERSISTENCE: DSPy Demonstration Storage

Add demonstration persistence to prompt_optimizer.py:

1. Read prompt_optimizer.py
2. Add save_demonstrations(filepath='demos.json') method
3. Add load_demonstrations(filepath='demos.json') method
4. Auto-save after collecting new demos
5. Auto-load at startup if file exists

Use JSON format. Ensure demos persist across sessions.
